title: What are the heart touching songs in Tamil? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have many heart touching songs in my playlist . Few of them are Vidai Kodu Engal Naadae Song From Kannathil MuthamittalVidukathaiya intha vazhkai From MuthuKanave Kanave From DavidEvano ooruvan From Alaipayuthaethen kizhakku cheemayile From Kizhaku Cheemayileporale ponnuthayi sad version From KaruththammaRaasathi from Thiruda ThirudaThendralae Thendralae From Kadhal_DesamVENNILAVAE Sad version from MINSARA KANAVUuyire uyire piriyadhey from Santhosh Subramaniyam����'�����

I read other answers. Compared to them mine will sound like a travel back on a time machine. Hold tight. Vullathil Nalla Vullam from KarnanSonnathu nee Thana from Nenjil Oru AlayamEnnai Yarendru Endru nee parkirai ( forgot the name of the movie. One of those Sivaji movies starting with PaKathiruppan Kamala Kannan from Utthama PuthiranMalarnthum malaratha malai ( forgot the name. Again a Sivaji movie)Katrinilay varum Geetham ( don't know the movie. Sung by MS. Kind of time travel even for me!)I can keep adding. But enough for now. Listen to them some time. you will find both lyrics and music enchanting.
